attributes.action: Stop saudi,s demolish prophet Mohammad (PBUH)' Birth place
attributes.additional_details:
Saudi government is going to demolish and flatten the  Prophet Mohammad's (SAW) birth place in name of extension of haram e Kaaba which actually is making place for residences of The Ing and imam e Kaaba. See the link
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2564712/Bulldozing-birthplace-Mohammed-Developers-set-demolish-building-site-Prophets-home-make-way-imams-residence.html
